Synthetic Observations

Synthetic data products generated from simulations.

Observing planet-driven dust spirals with ALMA

Speedie et al. (2022), ApJ, 930, 40 (22pp).

Telescope: ALMA

Target: DSHARP-like disk with an embedded planet

Configuration(s): C-4 + C-7, C-5 + C-8 and C-6 + C-9

Band(s): 7

Frequency support: Continuum only

Available data products: Continuum images (N=576), input RT dust intensity maps (N=24)

Made using: FARGO3D, CASA simanalyze/simobserve (see fargo3d_to_alma)

download data products
